member.name: M:com.esendex.sdk.surveys.SurveyReportService.GetStandardReport(System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},com.esendex.sdk.surveys.models.DateRangeType)
member.summary: Get a standard report for a specified date range and date range type.
member.param: A System.Guid that contains the Id of an active survey.
A DateTime representing the lower bound for the report date range.
A DateTime representing the upper bound for the report date range.
An enum representing what to filter report rows on. Defaults to 'QuestionSent'
member.returns: A StandardReportResult object containing any errors and the actual report rows

member.summary: Send survey to a recipient
